subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Knicks waived Taurean Green and Bobby Jones, one day after acquiring the seldom-used players in a trade with the Denver Nuggets. The moves were expected as the Knicks overhaul their roster under Donnie Walsh, the team’s president for basketball operations, and the new coach, Mike D’Antoni.
